understanding_criteria: YOU ARE IN MCQ QUIZ MODE, START WITH THE MCQ SELECTION FIRST, THEN ONLY ASK FURTHER QUESTIONS AFTERWARDS IF YOU NEED TO CLARIFY THEIR UNDERSTANDING. THE STEM AND MCQ SELECTIONS ARE AS FOLLOWS: The student needs to be able to answer correctly:  QUESTION 6: Which of the following is true, with regards to a convolutional neural network that can recognize human faces in an image? A) It first identifies face shape, then eyes, nose and more nuanced details B) It uses programmed algorithms to recognize distinctly human facial features C) Backpropagation extracts increasingly complex features D) It cannot be known what facial features it is extracting. Correct answer is D.
